verses.verse: וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a' unto Joshua אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תִּירָ֣א <WH3372> ti-Ra Fear וְאַל־ <WH408> ve-'al- not תֵּחָ֔ת <WH2865> te-Chat, not neither be thou dismayed קַ֣ח <WH3947> kach take עִמְּךָ֗ <WH5973> 'im-me-Cha, with אֵ֚ת <WH853> 'et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all עַ֣ם <WH5971> 'am all the people הַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> ham-mil-cha-Mah, of war וְק֖וּם <WH6965> ve-Kum with thee and arise עֲלֵ֣ה <WH5927> 'a-Leh go up הָעָ֑י <WH5857> ha-'Ai; to Ai רְאֵ֣ה׀ <WH7200> re-'Eh see נָתַ֣תִּי <WH5414> na-Tat-ti I have given בְיָדְךָ֗ <WH3027> ve-ya-de-Cha, into thy hand אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech the king הָעַי֙ <WH5857> ha-'Ai of Ai וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et עַמּ֔וֹ <WH5971> am-Mo, and his people וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et עִיר֖וֹ <WH5892> i-Ro and his city וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et אַרְצֽוֹ׃ <WH776> ar-Tzo. and his land

וְעָשִׂ֨יתָ <WH6213> ve-'a-Si-ta And thou shalt do לָעַ֜י <WH5857> la-'Ai to Ai וּלְמַלְכָּ֗הּ <WH4428> u-le-mal-Kah, and her king כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher you עָשִׂ֤יתָ <WH6213> 'a-Si-ta as thou didst לִֽירִיחוֹ֙ <WH3405> li-ri-Cho unto Jericho וּלְמַלְכָּ֔הּ <WH4428> u-le-mal-Kah, and her king רַק־ <WH7535> rak- its שְׁלָלָ֥הּ <WH7998> she-la-Lah only the spoil וּבְהֶמְתָּ֖הּ <WH929> u-ve-hem-Tah thereof and the cattle תָּבֹ֣זּוּ <WH962> ta-Voz-zu thereof shall ye take for a prey לָכֶ֑ם la-Chem; שִׂים־ <WH7760> sim- unto yourselves lay לְךָ֥ le-Cha אֹרֵ֛ב <WH693> 'o-Rev thee an ambush לָעִ֖יר <WH5892> la-'Ir for the city מֵאַחֲרֶֽיהָ׃ <WH310> me-'a-cha-Rei-ha. behind

וַיָּ֧קָם <WH6965> vai-Ya-kom arose יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a' So Joshua וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all עַ֥ם <WH5971> 'am and all the people הַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> ham-mil-cha-Mah of war לַעֲל֣וֹת <WH5927> la-'a-Lot to go up הָעָ֑י <WH5857> ha-'Ai; against Ai וַיִּבְחַ֣ר <WH977> vai-yiv-Char chose out יְ֠הוֹשֻׁעַ <WH3091> Ye-ho-shu-a' and Joshua שְׁלֹשִׁ֨ים <WH7970> she-lo-Shim thirty אֶ֤לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef thousand אִישׁ֙ <WH376> 'ish men גִּבּוֹרֵ֣י <WH1368> gib-bo-Rei mighty הַחַ֔יִל <WH2428> ha-Cha-yil, of valour וַיִּשְׁלָחֵ֖ם <WH7971> vai-yish-la-Chem and sent them away לָֽיְלָה׃ <WH3915> La-ye-lah. by night

וַיְצַ֨ו <WH6680> vay-Tzav And he commanded אֹתָ֜ם <WH853> 'o-Tam לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> le-Mor, them saying רְ֠אוּ <WH7200> Re-'u Behold אַתֶּ֞ם <WH859> 'at-Tem you אֹרְבִ֤ים <WH693> 'o-re-Vim ye shall lie in wait לָעִיר֙ <WH5892> la-'Ir against the city מֵאַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> me-'a-cha-Rei [even] behind הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> ha-'Ir, the city אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תַּרְחִ֥יקוּ <WH7368> tar-Chi-ku far מִן־ <WH4480> min- at הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> ha-'Ir from the city מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> me-'Od; not very וִהְיִיתֶ֥ם <WH1961> vih-yi-Tem become כֻּלְּכֶ֖ם <WH3605> kul-le-Chem all נְכֹנִֽים׃ <WH3559> ne-cho-Nim. but be ye all ready

וַאֲנִ֗י <WH589> va-'a-Ni, I וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol all הָעָם֙ <WH5971> ha-'Am And I and all the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who אִתִּ֔י <WH854> 'it-Ti, for נִקְרַ֖ב <WH7126> nik-Rav that [are] with me will approach אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about הָעִ֑יר <WH5892> ha-'Ir; unto the city וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah, become כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- and when יֵצְא֤וּ <WH3318> ye-tze-'U and it shall come to pass when they come out לִקְרָאתֵ֙נוּ֙ <WH7125> lik-ra-Te-nu against כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher who בָּרִֽאשֹׁנָ֔ה <WH7223> ba-ri-sho-Nah, us as at the first וְנַ֖סְנוּ <WH5127> ve-Nas-nu that we will flee לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH6440> lif-nei-Hem. before

וְיָצְא֣וּ <WH3318> ve-ya-tze-'U (For they will come out אַחֲרֵ֗ינוּ <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei-nu, after עַ֣ד <WH5704> 'ad until הַתִּיקֵ֤נוּ <WH5423> hat-ti-Ke-nu us) till we have drawn אוֹתָם֙ <WH853> o-Tam מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> ha-'Ir, them from the city כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for יֹֽאמְר֔וּ <WH559> yo-me-Ru, for they will say נָסִ֣ים <WH5127> na-Sim They flee לְפָנֵ֔ינוּ <WH6440> le-fa-Nei-nu, before כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher us בָּרִֽאשֹׁנָ֑ה <WH7223> ba-ri-sho-Nah; us as at the first וְנַ֖סְנוּ <WH5127> ve-Nas-nu therefore we will flee לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH6440> lif-nei-Hem. before

וְאַתֶּ֗ם <WH859> ve-'at-Tem, and you תָּקֻ֙מוּ֙ <WH6965> ta-Ku-mu Then ye shall rise up מֵהָ֣אוֹרֵ֔ב <WH693> me-Ha-'o-Rev, from the ambush וְהוֹרַשְׁתֶּ֖ם <WH3423> ve-ho-rash-Tem and seize אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָעִ֑יר <WH5892> ha-'Ir; upon the city וּנְתָנָ֛הּ <WH5414> u-ne-ta-Nah will deliver יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh for the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֖ם <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Chem your God בְּיֶדְכֶֽם׃ <WH3027> be-yed-Chem. it into your hand

וְהָיָ֞ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah become כְּתָפְשְׂכֶ֣ם <WH8610> ke-ta-fe-se-Chem And it shall be when ye have taken אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָעִ֗יר <WH5892> ha-'Ir, the city תַּצִּ֤יתוּ <WH3341> tatz-Tzi-tu [that] ye shall set אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָעִיר֙ <WH5892> ha-'Ir the city בָּאֵ֔שׁ <WH784> ba-'Esh, on fire כִּדְבַ֥ר <WH1697> kid-Var according to the commandment יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD תַּעֲשׂ֑וּ <WH6213> ta-'a-Su; shall ye do רְא֖וּ <WH7200> re-'U See צִוִּ֥יתִי <WH6680> tziv-Vi-ti I have commanded אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <WH853> 'et-Chem.

וַיִּשְׁלָחֵ֣ם <WH7971> vai-yish-la-Chem therefore sent them forth יְהוֹשֻׁ֗עַ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a', Joshua וַיֵּֽלְכוּ֙ <WH1980> vai-ye-le-Chu went אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הַמַּאְרָ֔ב <WH3993> ham-ma'-Rav, to lie in ambush וַיֵּשְׁב֗וּ <WH3427> vai-ye-she-Vu, and abode בֵּ֧ין <WH996> bein between בֵּֽית־ beit- אֵ֛ל <WH1008> 'el between Bethel וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> u-Vein between הָעַ֖י <WH5857> ha-'Ai and Ai מִיָּ֣ם <WH3220> mi-Yam on the west side לָעָ֑י <WH5857> la-'Ai; of Ai וַיָּ֧לֶן <WH3885> vai-Ya-len lodged יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a' but Joshua בַּלַּ֥יְלָה <WH3915> bal-Lay-lah that night הַה֖וּא <WH1931> ha-Hu he בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> be-Toch among הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> ha-'Am. the people

וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֤ם <WH7925> vai-yash-Kem rose up early יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a' And Joshua בַּבֹּ֔קֶר <WH1242> bab-Bo-ker, in the morning וַיִּפְקֹ֖ד <WH6485> vai-yif-Kod and numbered אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> ha-'Am; the people וַיַּ֨עַל <WH5927> vai-Ya-'al and went up ה֜וּא <WH1931> hu he וְזִקְנֵ֧י <WH2205> ve-zik-Nei he and the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> lif-Nei before הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> ha-'Am the people הָעָֽי׃ <WH5857> ha-'Ai. to Ai

וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol all הָעָ֨ם <WH5971> ha-'Am And all the people הַמִּלְחָמָ֜ה <WH4421> ham-mil-cha-Mah [even the people] of war אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who אִתּ֗וֹ <WH854> it-To, for עָלוּ֙ <WH5927> 'a-Lu that [were] with him went up וַֽיִּגְּשׁ֔וּ <WH5066> vai-yig-ge-Shu, and drew nigh וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <WH935> vai-ya-Vo-'u and came נֶ֣גֶד <WH5048> Ne-ged front הָעִ֑יר <WH5892> ha-'Ir; before the city וַֽיַּחֲנוּ֙ <WH2583> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched מִצְּפ֣וֹן <WH6828> mitz-tze-Fon on the north side לָעַ֔י <WH5857> la-'Ai, of Ai וְהַגַּ֖י <WH1516> ve-hag-Gai now [there was] a valley; בֵּינֹו bei-nov כבֵּינָ֥יו <WH996> bei-Nav between קוּבֵין־ <WH996> u-vein- between הָעָֽי׃ <WH5857> ha-'Ai. between them and Ai

וַיִּקַּ֕ח <WH3947> vai-yik-Kach And he took כַּחֲמֵ֥שֶׁת <WH2568> ka-cha-Me-shet about five אֲלָפִ֖ים <WH505> 'a-la-Fim thousand אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> 'Ish; men וַיָּ֨שֶׂם <WH7760> vai-Ya-sem and set אוֹתָ֜ם <WH853> o-Tam אֹרֵ֗ב <WH693> 'o-Rev, them to lie in ambush בֵּ֧ין <WH996> bein between בֵּֽית־ beit- אֵ֛ל <WH1008> 'el between Bethel וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> u-Vein between הָעַ֖י <WH5857> ha-'Ai and Ai מִיָּ֥ם <WH3220> mi-Yam on the west side לָעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> la-'Ir. of the city

וַיָּשִׂ֨ימוּ <WH7760> vai-ya-Si-mu And when they had set הָעָ֜ם <WH5971> ha-'Am the people אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֗ה <WH4264> ham-ma-cha-Neh, [even] all the host אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> 'a-Sher that was מִצְּפ֣וֹן <WH6828> mitz-tze-Fon that [was] on the north לָעִ֔יר <WH5892> la-'Ir, of the city וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et עֲקֵב֖וֹ <WH6119> a-ke-Vo and their liers in wait מִיָּ֣ם <WH3220> mi-Yam on the west לָעִ֑יר <WH5892> la-'Ir; of the city וַיֵּ֧לֶךְ <WH1980> vai-Ye-lech spent יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a' Joshua בַּלַּ֥יְלָה <WH3915> bal-Lay-lah that night הַה֖וּא <WH1931> ha-Hu he בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> be-Toch into the midst הָעֵֽמֶק׃ <WH6010> ha-'E-mek. of the valley

וַיְהִ֞י <WH1961> vay-Hi came כִּרְא֣וֹת <WH7200> kir-'ot saw מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Me-lech- And it came to pass when the king הָעַ֗י <WH5857> ha-'Ai, of Ai וַֽיְמַהֲר֡וּ <WH4116> vay-ma-ha-Ru [it] that they hasted וַיַּשְׁכִּ֡ימוּ <WH7925> vai-yash-Ki-mu and rose up early וַיֵּצְא֣וּ <WH3318> vai-ye-tze-'U went out אַנְשֵֽׁי־ <WH582> 'an-shei- and the men הָעִ֣יר <WH5892> ha-'Ir of the city לִקְרַֽאת־ <WH7125> lik-rat- against יִ֠שְׂרָאֵל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'el Israel לַֽמִּלְחָמָ֞ה <WH4421> lam-mil-cha-Mah to battle ה֧וּא <WH1931> hu he וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all עַמּ֛וֹ <WH5971> am-Mo he and all his people לַמּוֹעֵ֖ד <WH4150> lam-mo-'Ed at a time appointed לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> lif-Nei before הָֽעֲרָבָ֑ה <WH6160> ha-'a-ra-Vah; the plain וְהוּא֙ <WH1931> ve-Hu he לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo did not יָדַ֔ע <WH3045> ya-Da', but he wist כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for אֹרֵ֥ב <WH693> 'o-Rev not that [there were] liers in ambush ל֖וֹ lo מֵאַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> me-'a-cha-Rei against him behind הָעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> ha-'Ir. the city

וַיִּנָּֽגְע֛וּ <WH5060> vai-yin-na-ge-'U made as if they were beaten יְהוֹשֻׁ֥עַ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a' And Joshua וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El and all Israel לִפְנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6440> lif-nei-Hem; before וַיָּנֻ֖סוּ <WH5127> vai-ya-Nu-su them and fled דֶּ֥רֶךְ <WH1870> De-rech by the way הַמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <WH4057> ham-mid-Bar. of the wilderness

וַיִּזָּעֲק֗וּ <WH2199> vai-yiz-za-'a-Ku, were called כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and all הָעָם֙ <WH5971> ha-'Am And all the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who; בָּעִיר ba-'ir כבָּעַ֔י <WH5892> ba-'Ai, the city קלִרְדֹּ֖ף <WH7291> lir-Dof together to pursue אַחֲרֵיהֶ֑ם <WH310> 'a-cha-rei-Hem; after וַֽיִּרְדְּפוּ֙ <WH7291> vai-yir-de-Fu them and they pursued אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei after יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a', Joshua וַיִּנָּתְק֖וּ <WH5423> vai-yin-na-te-Ku and were drawn away מִן־ <WH4480> min- were in הָעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> ha-'Ir. from the city

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- not נִשְׁאַ֣ר <WH7604> nish-'Ar left אִ֗ישׁ <WH376> 'Ish, And there was not a man בָּעַי֙ <WH5857> ba-'Ai in Ai וּבֵ֣ית u-Veit אֵ֔ל <WH1008> 'El, or Bethel אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- had not יָצְא֖וּ <WH3318> ya-tze-'U that went not out אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei after יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; Israel וַיַּעַזְב֤וּ <WH5800> vai-ya-'az-Vu and they left אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָעִיר֙ <WH5892> ha-'Ir the city פְּתוּחָ֔ה <WH6605> pe-tu-Chah, open וַֽיִּרְדְּפ֖וּ <WH7291> vai-yir-de-Fu and pursued אַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei after יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. after Israel פ Peh
